Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Molecular Mechanisms of Pharmacological Action/Neurotransmitter Agents/Serotonin Agents/Serotonin Antagonists
Record.Description: Drugs that bind to but do not activate serotonin receptors, thereby blocking the actions of serotonin or serotonin agonists.
